array.string: router_path=$HOME/.ghq/github.com/tmsanrinsha/remote2local/router.php if [ -f $router_path ]; then osascript -e 'display notification "Start" with title "remote2local"' php -S 0.0.0.0:2224 $router_path else osascript -e 'display notification "No such file: '$router_path'" with title "remote2local"' fi
